titleInfo.title: Lord Curzon and Staff on R.I.M.S. Lawrence.' Photographer: Unknown

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:143 x 204 mmCondition:The print is in good condition, though the mounting paper is heavily foxed and crumbling.Foliation:‘25’Process:Silver gelatin

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject MatterGroup portrait of Lord Curzon and his personal staff and naval officers on board R. I. M. S. Lawrence. Curzon is seated second from left, wearing a flat cap. One of the men is Sir Louis William Dane (1856–1946).InscriptionsInk, below image: Lord Curzon and Staff on R.I.M.S. Lawrence.'Pencil, lower right, alongside image: ‘25’

name.namePart: 1st Marquess Curzon of Kedleston George Nathaniel Curzon
